channel.title: Silabsoft Client Items configured --- Now showing up though
channel.description:
Hello, I have a question. I have configured my server for Silabsoft items, it compiled fine, and now I'm trying to add a Dark Bow to my inventory, only to find out that it's not appearing.
There were no errors when compiling and stuff, and the pickup error doesn't appear, so what could be wrong?
UPDATE: The items appear in the character .txt file, but just don't show up in my inventory.
UPDATE #2: The items have a hover option, that say 'Equip' and the things they're sposed to say, but I can't see the model. Cache issue, or what?
UPDATE #3 (lol): The items appear to other people. o.o My Cache problem I'm guessing.
Thanks in advance, Zach
